mapper.insert: insert into JavaProject_participant(name, age, movieAttendance, gender, movieRating, additionalInfo, password) values(#{name},#{age},#{movieAttendance},#{gender},#{movieRating}, #{additionalInfo},sha1(#{password}))
mapper.select: select participant_no, name, age, movieAttendance, gender, movieRating, additionalInfo from JavaProject_participant order by name asc
select participant_no, name, age, movieAttendance, gender, movieRating, additionalInfo, created_date from JavaProject_participant where participant_no=#{no}
select participant_no, name, age, movieAttendance, gender, movieRating, additionalInfo, created_date from JavaProject_participant where name=#{name} and password=sha1(#{password})
mapper.update: update JavaProject_participant set name =#{name}, age = #{age}, movieAttendance = #{movieAttendance}, gender = #{gender}, movieRating = #{movieRating}, additionalInfo = #{additionalInfo}, password = sha1(#{password}) where participant_no =#{no}
